summary: Alsace is a region in eastern France near Germany and Switzerland. It has a unique culture that combines German and French influences. Alsace was once larger but lost some territory over time. It used to be its own administrative region but is now part of a larger region called Grand Est. The main city is Strasbourg, which is an important economic and cultural center. People in Alsace used to speak a German dialect called Alsatian, but now most speak French.
title: Alsace
